email.description: The email associated with the page.

meta_title.description: The meta title for SEO purposes.

body.description: The content or body of the page.

feed.description: The feed associated with the page.

link.description: The external link associated with the page.

contact_fields.description: Fields related to contact information on the page.

meta_keywords.description: The meta keywords for SEO purposes.

meta_description.description: The meta description for SEO purposes.

search_keywords.description: The keywords associated with the page for search purposes.

url.description: The URL or path of the page.

channel_id.description: The ID of the channel associated with the page.

name.description: The name or title of the page.

is_visible.description: Indicates if the page is visible on the storefront.

parent_id.description: The ID of the parent page if this page is a subpage.

sort_order.description: The order in which the page should be displayed.

type.description: The type or category of the page.

is_homepage.description: Indicates if the page is set as the homepage.

is_customers_only.description: Indicates if the page is accessible to customers only.

id.description: The unique identifier of the page.
